dcterms:creator: Martin Schiersch
Veselina Mironova
Maximilian Schmitt
Philippe Thomas
Aleksandra Gabryszak
Leonhard Hennig
dcterms:description: A large German-language corpus annotated with fine-grained geo-entities and a set of 15 traffic- and industry-related n-ary relations and events, allowing for training and evaluating named entity recognition algorithms and relation extraction systems.
dcterms:title: German Corpus for Fine-Grained Named Entity Recognition and Relation Extraction of Traffic and Industry Events

dcterms:creator: D. Benikova
C. Biemann
M. Reznicek
dcterms:description: A dataset providing guidelines and annotations for named entities in German, focusing on standard entity types.
dcterms:title: NoSta-D Named Entity Annotation for German

dcterms:creator: E. F. Tjong Kim Sang
F. De Meulder
dcterms:description: A dataset for named entity recognition that includes annotations for four entity types: persons, organizations, locations, and miscellaneous.
dcterms:title: CoNLL-2003 dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Doddington
A. Mitchell
M. Przybocki
L. Ramshaw
S. Strassel
R. Weischedel
dcterms:description: Datasets developed for the Automatic Content Extraction (ACE) program, which includes tasks for named entity recognition and relation extraction.
dcterms:title: ACE datasets

dcterms:creator: H. Ji
R. Grishman
H. T. Dang
dcterms:description: Datasets used in the TAC Knowledge Base Population challenges, focusing on entity and relation extraction.
dcterms:title: TAC-KBP challenges datasets

dcterms:description: A dataset for the SemEval-2010 Task 8, focusing on the multi-way classification of semantic relations between pairs of nominals.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2010 Task 8 dataset
